scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop && npm run db:setup && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:drop: env-cmd --silent cross-var dropdb %PGDATABASE% && echo db dropped || echo db does not exist
scripts.db:setup: env-cmd --silent createdb && echo db created || echo db already exists
scripts.db:reset:test: npm run db:drop:test && npm run db:setup:test && npm run db:seed:test
scripts.db:drop:test: env-cmd -f ./.env.test cross-var dropdb %PGDATABASE% && echo db dropped || echo db does not exist
scripts.db:setup:test: env-cmd -f ./.env.test cross-var createdb && echo db created || echo db already exists
